roleset.name: onward rotational motion

roles.note: Arg2-secondary attribute (PRD in effect) replaced by arg2-direction based on predicted frequency, VN.

roleset.note: Added by Julia. Based on roll-v.01 and VNcls roll-51.3.1. Corresponds to Vncls roll-51.3.1.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: There was a roll of laughter through the stands ,

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: A shooter began his roll of the dice Saturday, November 15, 2003 at approximately 11 p.m., and did not roll a "seven"
